Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

Memories

I feel nostalgic for The warmth of ⁠— the hospital bed The cold wet quiet ⁠— of fresh snow And other memories from long ago

I remember The chocolate sandwiched ice cream bar Cheap freezies ⁠— in elementary school A long yellow slide down Falling asleep to the rain outside

Masturbation in the dark Things in the bath And other things of that nature

Paging
